title: Theosophy - talks, readings and lectures (Mumbai - Part 2 of 2)
description: Audio podcasts (in a mixture of mp3 and wma format) of talks given at Mumbai Lodge of the ULT (United Lodge of Theosophists), on various philosophical and metaphysical subjects. See below for the titles of these talks. This collection of audio files was complete as of the 26th November 2017, but there will likely be new podcasts made available after this date, which can be found on the website of Mumbai (and Bengaluru) branches of the ULT at: http://www.ultindia.org/index.html by clicking on the 'lectures' tab. Enjoy, and please consider sharing if you know anyone who might benefit from this profound and timeless wisdom. Please be aware the audio quality of some of these files is not perfect. In most cases it's clear and listenable, but in some cases there's some heavy room echo and hiss from the device used to record the audio. Magic - Science or Superstition Man - Mortal and Immortal Meaning of sacrifice Messengers and Teachers Mind - Creative and Reactive Miracles of Faith and Will Our Gods and Other Gods Overcoming Karma Path of discipleship Paying our Karmic Debts Philosophy of Homeopathy Plato And His Ideas Powers of Mind Rebirth - a Logical Necessity Sensing The Sweet Side Of Life Shila - Character And Spiritual Integrity Spiritual Rebirth - Celebrating Easter Spiritual Significance of Christmas Sufism - Mohammedan Mysticism Tao Te King - Teachings Of Lao Tsu Teachings of Zarathushtra The Building of Home The Laws of Health and Healing The Life Beyond Death The Meaning Of Impersonality The Message of the Gita The Mysteries Of Human Mind The Mystery Of Human Nature The Path Of Action - Karma Marga The Paradox Of Death The Power Of Positive Thinking The Problem of Ethics Theosophy And Plato's Republic On Citizenship Theosophy and Upanishads Theosophy On Heaven And Hell Three Qualities - Sattva, Rajas And Tamas Thus Teach the Buddhas Truth And Our Civilization Truth in All Faiths Universal Ethics - Basis for decision making We are what we think What Is Man What Is A Theosophist Where Shall We Look For Help Why Do Good People Suffer Will To Overcome Evil - Celebrating Dashara Yoga of Detached Action Zoroastrian Way of Life
